titleStmt.title: A guide vnto godlinesse: or, A plaine and familiar explanation of the ten commandements, by questions and answeres fittest for the instruction of the simple and ignorant people. By Francis Bunny, one of the prebendaries of the Cathedrall Church of Durham.
Guide unto godlinesse.
titleStmt.author: Bunny, Francis, 1543-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. P[urslowe] for Ralph Rounthwait,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An exposition of the commandements.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
